statements: SELECT * FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name ASC
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name FROM farmers WHERE farm_size_acres > 50
SELECT farmer_name, crop_type FROM farmers WHERE risk_factor < 0.5
SELECT farmer_id, farm_size_acres FROM farmers WHERE crop_type = 'Corn'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_farmers FROM farmers
SELECT farmer_name, farm_size_acres FROM farmers WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY farm_size_acres DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT count(*) as total_farmers, avg(farm_size_acres) as average_farm_size FROM farmers WHERE crop_type = 'Soybean' GROUP BY crop_type
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_id FROM farmers WHERE risk_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY risk_factor DESC
SELECT * FROM farmers WHERE farmer_id IN (3, 5, 7)
SELECT farmer_name, crop_type, farm_size_acres FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name ASC, farm_size_acres DESC
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, risk_factor FROM farmers WHERE farm_size > 50;
SELECT * FROM farmers WHERE risk_factor < 0.5 AND farm_size < 100 ORDER BY farm_size ASC;
SELECT farmer_name, coverage_amount FROM farmers JOIN insurance_premiums ON farmers.farmer_id = insurance_premiums.farmer_id WHERE payment_status = 'paid';
SELECT farm_location, farm_size, risk_factor FROM farmers WHERE farm_location LIKE '%Valley%' ORDER BY risk_factor DESC, farm_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers WHERE farm_size > 50;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_size, risk_factor FROM farmers WHERE risk_factor >= 0.5 ORDER BY farm_size ASC;
SELECT f.farmer_name, i.premium_amount, i.coverage_amount FROM farmers f INNER JOIN insurance_premiums i ON f.farmer_id = i.farmer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS insurance_count, AVG(premium_amount) AS avg_premium FROM insurance_premiums WHERE payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name, farmer_address FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount, risk_factor FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_age FROM farmers WHERE farmer_age >= 40;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors ORDER BY factor_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE farmer_id = 100 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_id, farmer_id, risk_factor FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 5000;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_address FROM farmers WHERE farmer_age < 30 ORDER BY farmer_name;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies INNER JOIN farmers ON insurance_policies.farmer_id = farmers.farmer_id WHERE farmer_name LIKE 'J%' AND risk_factor < 0.5;
SELECT factor_description, factor_weight FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_weight BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY factor_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM Farmer;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_address FROM Farmer WHERE farmer_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, crop_yield FROM Crop ORDER BY crop_yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT risk_description, risk_value FROM RiskFactor WHERE risk_value > 50;
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name, farmer_address FROM Farmer;
SELECT * FROM Crop WHERE crop_yield > 5000 ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_coverage FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_coverage < 1000 AND policy_premium BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY policy_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactor WHERE risk_impact LIKE '%high%' AND risk_value > 5 ORDER BY risk_description;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_contact, crop_name, crop_yield, risk_description FROM Farmer JOIN Crop ON Farmer.farmer_id = Crop.crop_id JOIN RiskFactor ON Crop.crop_id = RiskFactor.risk_id;
SELECT * FROM farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_location FROM farmers WHERE farmer_id = 1;
SELECT farmer_name, crop_name, premium_amount FROM farmers f JOIN premium_calculation pc ON f.farmer_id = pc.farmer_id JOIN crops c ON pc.crop_id = c.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_calculation_id = 1;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM risk_factors;
SELECT * FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_location FROM farmers WHERE farmer_location='California';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, crop_value FROM crops WHERE crop_value > 5000 ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT policy_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies INNER JOIN premium_calculation ON insurance_policies.premium_calculation_id = premium_calculation.calculation_id ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
